column4: hey Pirate_Hunter  also i have on more question... when i boot ubuntu i do not get a boot screen... when i first used the live cd there was a boot screen now it only goes black for about 2 mins and the login screen pops up.. also sometime right after i login it goes black and no desktop pops up and i am forced to shut my comp down... what can cause that
gmm wierd i get like a sec from grub before my boot screen come up and yeha that whole no desktop coming up might be an issue with the comp
i dont exactly know the cause for you not having a boot screen especially since it has to load before login screen
give me a sec will search
